long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This addon is for users of e-racuni.com only.
It addes few enhancements.
If you have a product which has a lot of serial numbers, it is a pain to enter them one by one. This addon adds a textarea in to which you can just past in serial numbers and original serial inputs will be automatically filled. You can also have sequential serial, such as "ABC001-ABC010" and parser will fill them in as expected. Just make sure, Starting serial has the same total length as end and there can only be one - (dash) in total.
